text: The 2016–17 Liga IV Olt was the 49th season of the Liga IV Olt, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 27 August 2016 and ended on 4 June 2017. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Olt=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Olt * — ===From Liga IV Olt=== Promoted to Liga III * — Relegated to Liga V Olt * — ===Other chages=== * Juventus Slatina, Romanați Caracal, Oltețul Osica and CSȘ Slatina were entered in the championship on demand and Liga IV was expanded from twelve to sixteen teams. ==League table== ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2016–17 Liga I * 2016–17 Liga II * 2016–17 Liga III * 2016–17 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2016–17 Liga IV Alba * 2016–17 Liga IV Arad * 2016–17 Liga IV Bihor * 2016–17 Liga IV Galați * 2016–17 Liga IV Prahova * 2016–17 Liga IV Suceava * 2016–17 Liga IV Teleorman ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Liga IV seasons Category:Sport in Olt County
title: 2016–17 Liga IV Olt
